did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Middlesex County (Va.) Bond, Charles Reed (Reade) to Simon Fraser Conveying Land in the Town of Urbanna, 1787 Jan. 17

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Middlesex County (Va.) Bond, Charles Reed (Reade) to Simon Fraser Conveying Land in the Town of Urbanna, 1787 Jan. 17. Local government records collection, Middlesex County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item came to the Library of Virginia under the accession number 39918w.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Middlesex County was formed in 1669 from Lancaster County.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Middlesex County (Va.) Bond, Charles Reed (Reade) to Simon Fraser Conveying Land in the Town of Urbanna, 1787 Jan. 17. Documents the sale of two lots, one half acre each, for sixty pounds.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Middlesex County Bonds, Commissions, and Oaths can be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. Consult "A Guide to Virginia County and City Records on Microfilm."
